column4: during install, how long should i stare at red/white dots before I figure out that my older PC can't handle Ubuntu 11.04 ?
i tried 10.04 before lubuntu and the thing is installing, my Athlon + 750meg ram might work

you could always install the base system and boot manager and package manager--leave out the install software portion of an install then install lubuntu-desktop or lxdm for a faster light weight but still very versitle set of tools and X
